structure.unit: CLASSIFICATION AND DESIGNATION OF OFFENSES -- AUTHORIZED DISPOSITION

law.catch_line: Nonavailability of probation or suspension of sentence to violent offender -- Exception.
law.text: Probation shall not be granted to, nor shall the execution or imposition of sentence be suspended for, a person who has been designated as a violent offender as defined in KRS 439.3401, unless such probation is granted in accordance with KRS 439.3401.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 401, sec. 8, effective July 14, 2000.
